name: Total War: ATTILA - Longbeards Culture Pack
name_original: Total War: ATTILA - Longbeards Culture Pack
description:
Total War: ATTILA - Longbeards Culture Pack is a strategy game developed by Creative Assembly. It came out on 04-03-2015. SEGA published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Total War: ATTILA - Longbeards Culture Pack on PC.
